name: Godus Wars
description: Godus Wars mixes tactical Real Time Strategy gameplay with the mechanics of the God-Game genre.It’s fun, it’s simple and it’s brutal.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.4ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX260 or greater Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4ghz Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560 or greater Storage: 20 GB available space
